psychological_reasons: How often do you feel stressed, overwhelmed, or mentally exhausted? -> 'Very often' indicates high stress
Do distractions (social media, gaming, phone usage, social group) affect your routine? -> 'Very often' indicates low engagement
How clear are you about your career direction? -> 'No clarity at all' indicates poor goal clarity
Do you handle responsibilities at home that reduce study time (household work, siblings, famly business)? -> 'Regularly' indicates low motivation
How often do you feel lost or behind in classes? -> 'Often' indicates low self-efficacy
What is the biggest difficulty affecting your ability to continue smoothly in college? -> 'Feeling overwhelmed and mentally exhausted.' indicates high stress
If you ever thought about dropping out or taking a.txt break, what was the main reason? -> 'Stress and lack of clarity.' indicates high stress and poor goal clarity
recommended_interventions: Immediate counselling for stress and mental exhaustion
Goal setting and career counselling sessions
Academic support to address feeling lost or behind
